subtitleNullable: This dataset contains cleaned and preprocessed info of movies from 1970 to 2020.
descriptionNullable:
This is **cleaned movies datasets** , movie_list_1 contains movies from **1970 to 2012** and movie_list_2 contains movies from **2013 to 2020.**
I wanted to build a content based movie recommendation system so i started collecting these datasets ,did some preprocessing . 

Hope it helps others to save some time :-)
 

Original Datasets  : 
  [Dataset1](https://www.kaggle.com/rounakbanik/the-movies-dataset)
  [Dataset2](https://www.kaggle.com/stefanoleone992/imdb-extensive-dataset )
